name: Long Way To The Coast - beta
name_original: Long Way To The Coast - beta
description:
Long Way To The Coast is a modern text-based role-playing game set in a post-apocalyptic world. As a child who survived in the shelter, you must leave the ruined city and reach the South Coast.

Explore a beautiful, devastated world of letters and symbols. Find weapons and resources, fight for fellow human beings.

The game is under development. Join the Discord and take part in our journey.
